humanum_full_description_en:
Inscriptions from the " wood ", " 𤇾 " sound, " 𤇾 " as two wood burning candles, torches intersection, is " fluorescent " the beginning of the text (Qiu Xigui, Zhang Shi-chao). The original meaning of " Rong " is Tongmu (Xu Shen), and ancient books mostly refer to Wutong. "Shuowen": "Rong, Tongmu also. From the wood, the sound is shining. One said: Those who rise from the two ends of the house are proud." The extension of glory is the beauty of beauty. Because everything that is precious is called glory, and the righteousness of glory and shame is born.

The original meaning of " Rong " is paulownia. In addition, " Rong " also means the flower of a herbaceous plant, "Er Ya. "Shi Cao": "Wood is the flower, and grass is the glory." "Ronghua" originally meant that the grass and trees bloomed, "Xunzi. "Wang Zhi": "When the grass and trees flourish and flourish, the axe cannot enter the forest." Tao Qian, "Returning Speech": "Mu Xinxin is flourishing, and the spring begins to flow." Later, it was extended from the blooming scene Prosperity, beauty, prosperity, glory and other meanings. "Huainanzi. Xiuwu: "Death has a legacy, and life has a glorious name." "Lu Shi Chunqiu. "Wuda": "The three kings of the three kings, whose name is all honorable." Gao You's note: "Rong, show also."

Bronze is used as a surname.
humanum_short_description_en: Inscriptions from the " wood ", " 𤇾 " sound ( " fluorescent beginning of the text"), the original meaning is Paulownia, Indus.
humanum_full_description:
金文從「木」，「𤇾」聲，「𤇾」象兩枝燃燒着的柴燭、火把相交，是「熒」的初文(裘錫圭、張世超)。「榮」的本義是桐木(許慎)，古書多指梧桐。《說文》：「榮，桐木也。从木，熒省聲。一曰：屋梠之兩頭起者爲榮。」徐灝《說文段注箋》：「俗偁華桐即榮桐也。榮之引申為凡華美之偁。因之凡貴重者皆曰榮，而榮辱之義生焉。」

　　「榮」的本義為桐木。此外，「榮」又表示草本植物的花，《爾雅．釋草》：「木謂之華，草謂之榮。」「榮華」最初表示草木開花，《荀子．王制》：「草木榮華滋碩之時，則斧斤不入山林。」陶潛〈歸去來辭〉：「木欣欣以向榮，泉涓涓而始流。」後來從花朵盛開的景象引申表示盛多、華美、顯達富貴、光榮等義。《淮南子．脩務》：「死有遺業，生有榮名。」《呂氏春秋．務大》：「三王之佐，其名無不榮者。」高誘注：「榮，顯也。」

　　金文用作姓氏。
humanum_short_description: 金文從「木」，「𤇾」聲（「熒」的初文），本義是桐木、梧桐。

①草木茂盛，引申爲興盛：榮枯(草木盛衰，喻得意失意)。榮悴(榮枯)。
②受人敬重，與“辱”相對：光榮。榮升。榮譽。
③在“梧桐”的別稱。
④草開花，亦泛指草木的花：綠葉素榮。榮華。
⑤姓氏。

榮字的基本解释

榮
róng
见“荣”。

榮字的汉语字典释义

[①]［róng］
［《廣韻》永兵切，平庚，云。］
“荣1”的繁体字。
(1)桐木。
(2)草木的花。
(3)繁茂，茂盛。
(4)盛多；丰富。
(5)乐，快乐。
(6)显荣；富贵。
(7)光荣，荣耀。与“辱”相对。
(8)称誉，赞扬。
(9)谓虚费。
(10)屋檐两端上翘的部分。今通称飞檐。
(11)美好的气色。
(12)中医指人体的营养作用或血液循环功能的一个方面。亦专指血。
(13)通“營”。迷惑，惑乱。
(14)古国名。
(15)姓。春秋时有荣启期。见《列子·天瑞》。

榮字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　榮； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页544第17
【唐韻】永兵切【集韻】【正韻】于平切【韻會】於營切，?音營。【說文】桐木也。見桐字註。　又屋梠之兩頭起者爲榮。【禮·喪大記】升自東榮，降自西北榮。【註】榮屋翼也。　又榮華。【爾雅·釋草】木謂之華，草謂之榮。不榮而實者謂之秀，榮而不實者謂之英。　又【淮南子·時則訓】秋行夏令爲華，行春令爲榮。　又榮者，辱之反。【老子·道德經】知其榮，守其辱。　又人以血爲榮，以氣爲衞。【內經】榮衞不行，五臟不通。　又【諡法】寵祿光大曰榮。　又州名。【前漢·地理志】屬犍爲郡，唐置榮州。　又杜榮，草也。《爾雅》莣，杜榮。註似茅，皮可以爲繩索履屩。　又姓。【史記·聖門弟子傳】榮旂。【莊子】榮啓期。　又【集韻】維傾切，音營。義同。　又叶以中切，音融。【越絕書】種留封侯，不知令終。二賢比德，種獨不榮。【楊愼云】東韻宜收榮字。　又叶爲命切，音詠。【揚雄·太?經】宗其高年，鬼待敬也。牽羊于叢，不足榮也。鼎血之蕕，信王命也。

考證：〔又杜榮，忘憂艸

Basic explanation of words
Rong
róng

Rong
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［róng］
["Guangyun" Yong Bingqie, Ping Geng, Yun. ]
Traditional characters for "荣1".
(1) Paulownia.
(2) Flowers of plants and trees.
(3) Lush and lush.
(4) Shengdu; rich.
(5) Joy, happiness.
(6) Prosperity; wealth and honor.
(7) Glory, glory. Contrast with "humiliation".
(8) Praise, praise.
(9) It is called a virtual fee.
(10) The upturned part at both ends of the eaves. Today it is commonly called cornice.
(11) Beautiful complexion.
(12) Traditional Chinese Medicine refers to an aspect of the human body's nutritional function or blood circulation function. Also refers specifically to blood.
(13) Through "Camp". Confused, confused.
(14) Ancient country name.
(15) Last name. There is a period of prosperity in the Spring and Autumn Period. See "Liezi·Tianrui".
Rong

[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　 Rong; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 544 Page 17
[Tang Yun] Yong Bing cut [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun] Yu Ping cut [Yun Hui] Yu Ying cut,? Yinying. [Said the text] Paulownia also. See Tong Zi Note.　It's proud to rise at both ends of the house. [Rituals and Funeral Records] Ascended from Dongrong, descended from Northwest Rong. [Note] Rongwu Wing also.　Ronghua again. [Erya·Shucao] Wood is the flower, and the grass is the glory. Those who are not prosperous and true are called Xiu, and those who are not prosperous are called Zhiying.　[Huainanzi·Shi Zexun] Autumn and summer are for China, and spring is for glory.　The one who is honored is the opposite of shame. [Laozi·Tao De Jing] Know its glory and keep its shame.　People are proud of blood and defend by qi. [Internal Classics] Rongwei is not good, and the five internal organs are impassable.　 [Posthumously] Pamper you with glory and glory.　Also the name of the state. [Pre-Han Geography] It belongs to Qianwei County, and Rongzhou was established in Tang Dynasty.　Du Rong again, grass also. "Er Ya" You, Du Rong. Note that the skin can be used as a rope.　Another last name. 【Historical Records·The Biography of the Sacred Disciple】Rong Qi. [Zhuangzi] Rong Qiqi.　[Jiyun] Wei Qingqie, Yinying. The same meaning.　The leaves are cut in the middle again, and the sound melts. [Yue Jue Shu] Kindly stayed and sealed Hou, I do not know the end. The two sages are not proud of being alone. [Yang Mingyun] Dongyun should receive the word "Rong".　The leaves are cut for life, and the sound chants. 【Yang Xiong·Tai? Scripture】Zong Qi's high years, ghosts wait for respect.
